alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Haywood; Madison (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 5:24PM EDT until July 29 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in western North Carolina... Northern Haywood County in western North Carolina... Northwestern Buncombe County in western North Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 523 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Greeneville Tennessee to 10 miles southeast of Newport to 11 miles northeast of Gatlinburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Marshall, Hot Springs, Smoky Mountains-Cataloochee, Smoky Mountains-Big Creek, Waterville, Fines Creek, Max Patch, Cove Creek, Faust and Allenstand. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
